---
id: update-secret
title: "UpdateSecret"
description: "Updates an existing secret's value or description. The value is re-encrypted with the current workspace encryption key. Returns masked value."
sidebar_label: "UpdateSecret"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "patch api-method"
info_path: docs/api/superposition
custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"UpdateSecret"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/secrets/{name}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing secret's value or description. The value is re-encrypted with the current workspace encryption key. Returns masked value.

  id={"request"}
